CorruptedCard.name: Corrupted Card
CorruptedCard.description: At the end of each combat, a random corrupted card will be removed from your deck.

CorruptedArtifact.name: Corrupted Artifact
CorruptedArtifact.description: Corrupted artifacts will be removed after the first or second zone boss.

InfinityArtifact.name: INFINITY TRACKER
InfinityArtifact.description: At the start of each zone, increase the difficulty of all future fights.

boot.text: SYSTEM TIME CORRUPTED!! >>> <c=downside>MUST REVERT POWER!</c> PLEASE SELECT REBOOT OPTION

artifact.single: Corrupt an artifact for Z1 & Corrupt an artifact for Z2
artifact.double: Corrupt two artifacts for Z1 & Corrupt two artifacts for Z2.
